Articles.Content:
Over Christmas, after a couple of hours watching me build rockets and showing her how the basics worked, I let my niece loose on KSP. This is what happens when you put a five-year-old in charge of your space program...

Everything here is unprompted, save for a couple of reminders of which keys did what.
That is a great video! Thanks for sharing!
Totally adorable. In fact, this doesn't even need to be said. Saying it anyway.
